title: IntelliJ - runAllTests - io.quarkus.test.junit.QuarkusTestExtension.beforeClassCallbacks is null
body:
### Describe the bug

Hello,

I've generated simple quarkus project with code.quarkus.io using default options with only resteasy reactive selected.

Project was imported into IntelliJ IDEA 2022.2.3 Ultimate.
It is building fine using maven but when I've tried to run all tests in src/test/java I've got strange error.

GreatingResourceIT  -> test passed
GreetingResourceTest ->

